subject: Drugs (Pharmaceuticals)
Football
Robberies and Thefts
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Sean Payton calmly took questions about a lawsuit against the New Orleans Saints, saying he “appreciated” the interest in a case that alleges an attempt to cover up prescription drug thefts at club headquarters.
snippet: Sean Payton calmly took questions about a lawsuit against the New Orleans Saints, saying he “appreciated” the interest in a case that alleges an attempt to cover up prescription drug thefts at club headquarters.
